title: Broccoli, Red Cabbage And Lettuce
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Broccoli, Red Cabbage And Lettuce a try. This recipe serves 1 and costs $5.92 per serving. One portion of this dish contains approximately 14g of protein, 21g of fat, and a total of 466 calories. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 diet. A mixture of spring onions, sesame seeds, chives, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 90%. This score is super. Try Spiralized Red Cabbage Kohlrabi Slaw with Cilantro Vinaigrette, Broccoli, Carrots And Lettuce, and Broccoli, Beetroot And Lettuce for similar recipes.
